response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value and relevance to you, estimated at $1,200,000. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This is a rare chance to secure such a valuable asset at a discount, considering its true worth.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am here to assist you through every step of the process.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1100000}
